TopicTitle: Some texturing info for a guy that doesn't know how to texture?

Articles.Content: I'm trying to make a 1 kerb capsule as a mod but I haz no idea how to texture. Can anyone give me advice on how to UV map or whatever, at least so that I can paint it orange?

If all you need is a single solid color (or placeholder texture), you can do everything in, for example, Blender. Otherwise, you'll want to use an image editor or painting app too.

It would be best if you let us know what 3D modeling app you are using. Also, I imagine that you have an image editor or painting app? Tell us what apps you are using.

I'm trying to make a 1 kerb capsule as a mod but I haz no idea how to texture. Can anyone give me advice on how to UV map or whatever, at least so that I can paint it orange?

Oh boy. I don't mean to be dismissive, but if you're a complete beginner, then it would be better if you just went on Youtube and started watching tutorials. I'm not sure anyone is going to want to teach you everything you need. At least get the basics down first.
